item.title: Visual Representation Basics II
item.description: Contents Slides Extra-dimensional aesthetics Guessing the identity of the Trump resistance op-ed writer with R Workhouses and star movies Lab Session: ggplot2 (part 2) Slides Download the slides from today’s lecture. Extra-dimensional aesthetics Make your own animated plots with gganimate Video of simulated Hurricane Florence storm surge The Wall Street Journal’s audio-based visualization of Hamilton’s internal rhymes Guessing the identity of the Trump resistance op-ed writer with R David Robinson’s approach Mike Kearney’s approach: his code and his short article Workhouses and star movies Download this zip file, extract it, and open the file named week3.
